name: BNY Mellon
description: BNY Mellon, officially known as The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation, is a global investments company that helps clients manage and service their financial assets throughout the investment lifecycle. Founded in 1784, BNY Mellon has a rich heritage and is one of the oldest financial institutions in the United States. The company operates in two primary segments: Investment Management and Investment Services. Investment Management provides a range of investment solutions, including mutual funds, exchange-traded funds (ETFs), and private equity. Investment Services includes asset servicing, collateral management, and securities lending, ensuring that clients' assets are managed efficiently and securely. With a presence in over 35 countries, BNY Mellon serves institutions, corporations, and individuals, leveraging advanced technology and data analytics to enhance investment performance and operational efficiency. The firm is committed to sustainable investing and is a proponent of responsible finance, integrating environmental, social, and governance (ESG) factors into its investment strategies. BNY Mellon's mission is to empower clients to succeed in a complex financial landscape, providing them with innovative solutions and exceptional service to navigate their investment journeys.
